WebClientPrint for ASP.NET
by Neodynamic SRL
http://www.neodynamic.com

README
==========================

Thank you for your interest in Neodynamic WebClientPrint for ASP.NET.


[*] Getting Started

     [*] Download Sample Code for ASP.NET WebForms & MVC
         Create an empty ASP.NET website project and then add a reference to 
         the WebClientPrint Samples available at http://www.nuget.org 		

     [*] Online Documentation
         We encourage you to read and download the WebClientPrint for ASP.NET
         help docs from http://www.neodynamic.com/products/help/


[*] Do you need assistance?
Please feel free to ask us any questions or make any comments. 
Just contact us at support@neodynamic.com or 
http://www.neodynamic.com/support


Thank you again for considering Neodynamic for your development needs. 
We look forward to working with you.
